content: I've been trying to keep up with reported issues... I think I've done what I can/need to right now. Let me know if there's any more. Else I'm actually going to look at tasks...

well, guess what? :)
I ran this by Lloyd first

Lloyd noted the name was missing but adding it didn't change anything

I can send you the spreadsheet, if that's sufficient
just note that there are other issues which I haven't fixed yet - encountered this one first
So it's clear that I won't get through the IG Publisher tasks. I just took 6 hours to do 1....
so if anyone wants to ask for specific tasks to be prioritised, feel free
